description: Sep. 2025 - delivered a talk on Running On-Device AI Models on android using capacitor, angular, transformer.js at ngIndia Chennai Meetup
Nov. 2023 - delivered a talk on AI in IoT at a ATAL Sponsored Faculty Development Programme on (Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Industrial Internet of Things 5.0)
Nov. 2022 - delivered a talk on Data Analysis in Io(B)T at a DRDO Sponsored One Week Workshop On 'Blockchain Assisted Secured Data Analytics In Internet Of Battlefield Things (ioBt)'
